DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate ability NICU staff interpret , train period , symmetry , sedation level , seizures activity artefact continuous cEEG/qEEG tracing .
DOC.detailed_description: Using web base tool , clinicians two study center review 24 hour record ( raw EEG data + derive qEEG variable ) . The intensivists evaluate : - symmetry , - sedation level , - seizures activity - artefact continuous cEEG/qEEG tracing . The tracing blindly review certified neurophysiologist ( use app ) . The neurophysiologist evaluation consider `` reference '' . The result evaluation compare ( intensivists vs. neurophysiologist ) order understand intensivists able adequately identify pathological finding . The study period : - formal training - formal training neurophysiologist order understand training able improve intensivists performance .
DOC.criteria: Intensivists wil evaluate daily qEEG recording : Patients coma traumatic/vascular event Admitted neurointensive care Recorded continuous EEG clinical reason No EEG record > 24 hour
